talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Oh, sorry, sorry. I mistook you for
someone else.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Just earlier, a <clr:0000>blond-haired <clr:ffff>Hylian like
you headed off towards <clr:0000>HQ<clr:ffff>.

Now that I think about it, that Hylian was
a <clr:0000>woman<clr:ffff>!
talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_01>Didn't you go off toward <clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff>?


You didn't get hurt?
talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's rare to see a Hylian around here
unless they're part of YunoboCo.

The one who headed to <clr:0000>YunoboCo HQ<clr:ffff>
earlier was a<clr:0000> blond-haired lady<clr:ffff>. Sorry for
the mix-up.
talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><clr:0000>Death Mountain <clr:ffff>is back to normal, the
marbled rock roast is gone, and the
young Gorons are back to work.
Maybe I can take a little break.
talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Oh, sorry, sorry. I mistook you for
someone else.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Just earlier, a <clr:0000>blond-haired <clr:ffff>Hylian like
you headed off toward <clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff>.

Now that I think about it, that Hylian was
a <clr:0000>woman<clr:ffff>.
talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I was worried that <clr:0000>Death Mountain <clr:ffff>had
erupted when that thing came writhing
outta there.
But now the mountain's back to normal,
the marbled rock roast is gone, and the
young Gorons are back to work.
Maybe I can take a little break.
talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_01>Huh? Didn't you head off to
YunoboCo HQ?
talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's rare to see a Hylian around here
unless they're part of YunoboCo.

The one who headed to <clr:0000>Death Mountain<clr:ffff>
earlier was a<clr:0000> blond-haired lady<clr:ffff>. Sorry for
the mix-up.
